short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An Extensive New Default Tab for a productive and simple interface.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A New Tab with hand picked speed dials and Bookmarks Listing to have instant access to the respective links. Also , consists of a Reminder Tab to remember the most important task of the day.
The Sole Purpose of making Simplex was to increase the productivity of every user in a positive way. 
 Any Suggestions are always welcome. 

Rate and Comment if you Like.
Your Support will help me, to further improve the extension.
